All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Channel
This class represents a chat channel and handles every interaction with this channel
ChannelAPI
External API for accessing channels
ChatPlayer
This class represents a player using LapisChat
LapisChatEvent
This event is fired when a player sends a chat message
LapisMessageEvent
This event is fired when a player sends a private message to another player on the server
